title: Strange Sounds Vol. 1
description: Strange Sounds offers a surreal auditory journey for unconventional games. RNG-generated, aleatoric methods, and maddening qualities make each track and sound effect a unique experience, this pack is perfect for creators seeking the extraordinary.
longDescription:
Strange Sounds Vol 1

A journey into the unknown

Embark on a surreal auditory adventure with "Strange Sounds Vol 1." a sound pack meticulously crafted for games that defy the ordinary and embrace the extraordinary. This pack is perfect for Psychological Thrillers, Sci-Fi Adventures, Experimental Indie Games, and any narrative that seeks to challenge, mystify, and astonish.


From the aleatoric chaos of unpredictable universes to the maddening echoes of alternate realities, "Strange Sounds Vol. 1" is designed for stories that captivate the imagination and challenge the boundaries of conventional gaming.


Generated with AI using StableAudio, here's a sample of a few of the tracks and their prompts you can expect to see used in this sample pack:


Aleatoric Sensations

  1. Spender's Journey: Aleatoric, Mixolydian, Violin, BPM Changes, Evocative, 60-120 BPM, Full Track
  2. Cosmic Dice: Aleatoric, Altered Scale, Theremin, Maddening, 42-84 BPM, Full Track

Non-Sequitur Theater

  1. Sirens of the Abyss: Spanish Phrygian, Sirens, Wailing, Dissonance, 100-200 BPM, Full Track
  2. Dobro Dreams: Dorian, Dobro, Vocal, Harmony, 75-150 BPM, Full Track

Absurd Sensations

  1. Crashing Waves of Noise: Diminished Scale, Harsh Noise, Crashing, Loud, 50-100 BPM, Full Track
  2. Electric Circus: Whole Scale, Electric Piano, Call and Response, Blaring, 130-260 BPM, Full Track

Time-Warping

  1. Impressionist Time: Atonal, Piano, Impressionist, Key Changes, 88-176 BPM, Full Track
  2. Warping Chants: Dorian, Chanting, Time-Stretching, Evocative, 60-120 BPM, Full Track

RNG Madness

  1. RNG Symphony: Aleatoric, RNG, Violin, Guitar, Maddening, 0-300 BPM, Full Track
  2. Spender's Gamble: RNG, Mixolydian, Theremin, Unpredictable, 20-40 BPM, Full Track

Sensory Overload

  1. Overloaded Harmony: Spanish Phrygian, Vocal, Harmony, Overwhelming, 256 BPM, Full Track
  2. Blaring Dissonance: Diminished Scale, Sirens, Dissonance, Loud, 200-400 BPM, Full Track

Mix and Match

  1. Aleatoric Drone: Drone, Mixolydian, Maddening, 10-20 BPM, Full Track
  2. Electric Dissonance: Atonal, Electric Piano, Dissonance, 140-280 BPM, Full Track
  3. Wailing Guitar: Dorian, Guitar, Wailing, Evocative, 90-180 BPM, Full Track
  4. Impressionist Violin: Altered Scale, Violin, Impressionist, 110-220 BPM, Full Track
  5. Chanting Sirens: Spanish Phrygian, Chanting, Sirens, 44-88 BPM, Full Track
  6. Spender's Drone: Drone, Whole Scale, Maddening, 33-66 BPM, Full Track
  7. RNG Electric: RNG, Electric Piano, Unpredictable, 55-110 BPM, Full Track
  8. Time-Warping Dobro: Dorian, Dobro, Time-Stretching, 77-154 BPM, Full Track


The full pack can be streamed from my SoundCloud

Prepared by Scarlet Death via deathOS

I may be commissioned to process generative computational tasks via Promptress.ai
technicalDetails:
Features:
  •  Eight five-second loops
  •  37 seven-second loops
  •  38 minute-and-a-half loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 83

Number of Audio Cues: 83

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes [mostly]

Minutes of audio provided: 1:01:59

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Important/Additional Notes: According to the StableAudio terms of service at this time of writing, the generated outputs may not be used by third parties to train their datasets.
